# style

**Instance Property**

The style applied to the action button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var style: UITableViewRowAction.Style { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is set at creation time and can’t be changed later.

## Configuring the action’s appearance

- **UITableViewRowAction.Style**: Constants that specify the appearance of action buttons.
- **title**: The title of the action button.
- **backgroundColor**: The background color of the action button.
- **backgroundEffect**: The visual effect to apply to the button.
